abstract: Fiat Chrysler is recalling 164,000 Jeep Cherokee SUVs worldwide to install shields that stop water from getting into the power rear lift gate controls, which poses a risk of fire.
lead_paragraph: Fiat Chrysler is recalling 164,000 Jeep Cherokee S.U.V.s worldwide to install shields that stop water from getting into the power rear lift gate controls, which poses a risk of fire.

headline.main: Fiat Chrysler Issues Recall for 164,000 Jeep Cherokees
headline.print_headline: Fiat Chrysler Issues Recall for 164,000 Jeep Cherokees

snippet: Fiat Chrysler is recalling 164,000 Jeep Cherokee S.U.V.s worldwide to install shields that stop water from getting into the power rear lift gate controls, which poses a risk of fire.
